Faction.name: The Eruditio
Faction.Description: Accumulate points based on battle outcomes. You can open the vault once per match to receive rewards of different values based on points collected, along with exclusive Equipment.

4.description: 2 for win, 5 for defeat. Exclusive Equipment DMG +30%.

6.description: 5 for win, 10 for defeat. Recover 2 Commander HP each round. Exclusive Equipment DMG +80%.
